title: Step Cassandra Writer
content:
This step is implemented only as MapReduce step running on Hadoop. Local run is not supported.

It is impossible to run this step from GUI. You must run plan from command line with "guava-18.0.jar" added to Hadoop distributed cache.

Tested on Cassandra v2.2.4.

It enable user to write data into Cassandra's keyspace and column family.
